headline: As New Virus Spreads From China, Scientists See Grim Reminders
abstract: Epidemics of related viruses, like SARS, killed hundreds. But the W.H.O. has postponed a decision on whether the new outbreak is a global emergency.
lead_paragraph: Less than a month after the first few cases of a new respiratory illness were reported in Wuhan, China, travelers have carried the virus to at least four other countries, including the United States. More than 500 people are known to have been infected, at least 17 have died â€” and the world is bracing itself for what might come next.
